long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aura AI Scribe is a revolutionary AI-powered medical scribe designed specifically for healthcare providers to reduce documentation burden and enhance patient care. Aura AI Scribe automatically captures and transcribes patient-provider conversations, generating comprehensive clinical notes in real-time.

This Chrome extension provides seamless integration with your EHR. Open Aura AI Scribe Chrome extension and easily copy / paste notes into your EHR from the same browser window.
